programme.title: Festival Ramadan 2022
programme.desc: Keseronokan pencarian bakat memberi warna pada bulan yang penuh barakah ini! Kami bawakan kepada anda Qasidah, Marawis, dan pelbagai keunikan dan hiburan.(n)

programme.title: Barakallah
programme.desc: Barakallah merupakan program tausiah yang dibimbing oleh Abdel Achrian bersama Ustaz Solmed dan Ustaz Taufiqurrahman yang akan memfokuskan kepada membincangkan permasalahan yang sering dialami oleh masyarakat hingga kepada masalah kehidupan rumah tangga.(n)

programme.title: Ujian Kesabaran Ibu Penjual Angkringan Di Bulan Yang Penuh Ampunan
programme.desc: Mak Lela kini tinggal bersama anaknya, Lukman dan keluarga selepas pengsan di gerai kereta sorongnya. Isteri Luqman, Santi dan anak perempuan, Nada berasa kurang senang dengan kehadiran dan nasihat Mak Leha. Mereka akan menyeksa Mak Leha apabila Luqman tiada di rumah.(n)

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.(n)

programme.title: Semarak Indosiar 2020
programme.desc: Kemegahan panggung Indosiar dengan keindahan budaya Indonesia meskipun di tengah pandemik. Dianjurkan oleh hos terkenal Indonesia dan persembahan menakjubkan oleh pelbagai artis dan penyanyi.(n)

programme.title: Cinta Misteri
programme.desc: Seorang gadis bernama Kinanti yang baru berpindah ke Jakarta dan bersekolah di sekolah antarabangsa. Walaupun ada orang yang tidak menyukainya, dia berkawan dengan ramai pelajar. Kinanti juga berkawan dengan seorang gadis bernama Dinda. Rupanya, Dinda adalah hantu yang menetap di sekolah itu. Sejak itu, Kinanti dan rakannya sering berurusan dengan hantu. Sering kali mereka mengalami pengembaraan menarik yang berkaitan dengan dunia mistik.(n)

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.(n)

programme.title: Dewi Rindu
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.(n)

programme.title: Berkah Ramadan Si Penjual Dodol Keliling Yang Malang
programme.desc: Fatur adalah anak kepada penjual dodol. Walau apa pun ujiannya, dia menghadapinya dengan penuh keikhlasan.(n)

programme.desc: Keseronokan pencarian bakat memberi warna pada bulan yang penuh barakah ini! Kami bawakan kepada anda Qasidah, Marawis, dan pelbagai keunikan dan hiburan.(n)

programme.title: Jodoh Bambang Anti Nyasar
programme.desc: Apakah yang akan berlaku sekiranya pemandu teksi terpaksa menjadi pengantin pengganti kepada penumpangnya?(n)

programme.title: Bukan Salah Cinta
programme.desc: Danang tidak dapat menafikan perasaannya terhadap Saras. Sebenarnya cinta itu tidak salah, tetapi yang salah ialah status mereka yang bergelar guru dan pelajar. Mampukah Danang jatuh cinta dengan Saras yang sebenarnya gurunya sendiri?(n)

programme.title: The Sultan
programme.desc: The Sultan adalah rancangan bual bicara yang menampilkan dua pengacara yang kaya bak Sultan, iaitu Sultan Andara-Raffi Ahmad dan Sultan Bintaro-Andre Taulany dan ditemani oleh pengawal yang cantik dan tampan. Rancangan ini turut menampilkan bintang-bintang tetamu Indonesia yang terkenal.(n)

programme.title: Di Sebelah Ada Surga

Masa muda mereka telah diisikan dengan santai tanpa mempedulikan masa depan. Mereka sibuk mengejar keseronokan duniawi yang tipikal dari golongan belia hari ini.(n)

programme.title: 32 Hari Jadi Pasutri, dan Terjadi Lagi
programme.desc: Brian menuduh Riana menyebabkan neneknya jatuh sakit selepas memakan mi ayamnya. Mee ayam Riana pula memang terkenal dengan kebersihannya. Apa yang berlaku seterusnya?(n)

programme.title: Festival Ramadan 2022
programme.desc: Keseronokan pencarian bakat memberi warna pada bulan yang penuh barakah ini! Kami bawakan kepada anda Qasidah, Marawis, dan pelbagai keunikan dan hiburan.(n)

programme.title: Barakallah
programme.desc: Barakallah merupakan program tausiah yang dibimbing oleh Abdel Achrian bersama Ustaz Solmed dan Ustaz Taufiqurrahman yang akan memfokuskan kepada membincangkan permasalahan yang sering dialami oleh masyarakat hingga kepada masalah kehidupan rumah tangga.(n)

programme.title: Pop Academy
programme.desc: Pop Academy adalah arena pencarian bakat muzik pop terbesar di Indonesia yang mencari bakat muda Indonesia yang mempunyai suara emas dalam menyanyikan genre muzik pop dan bersedia menjadi bintang. Dengan tagline "Be Pop Academy and Be A Super Stars\.(n)

programme.title: 32 Hari Jadi Pasutri, dan Terjadi Lagi
programme.desc: Brian menuduh Riana menyebabkan neneknya jatuh sakit selepas memakan mi ayamnya. Mee ayam Riana pula memang terkenal dengan kebersihannya. Apa yang berlaku seterusnya?(n)

programme.title: Perjuangan Bocah Penjual Cobek Yang Ingin Bertemu Tuhan
programme.desc: Ibu bapa Farel meninggal dunia ketika dalam perjalanan untuk menjemputnya dari sekolah. Kegembiraan Farel memenangi trofi itu serta-merta bertukar menjadi kesedihan yang mendalam. Sejak itu, dia diamanahkan kepada bapa saudaranya. Namun, isteri bapa saudaranya tidak sanggup menjaga Farel secara percuma. Oleh itu, dia disuruh menjual mortar untuk mendapatkan wang.(n)

programme.title: Ujian Kesabaran Ibu Penjual Angkringan Di Bulan Yang Penuh Ampunan
programme.desc: Mak Lela kini tinggal bersama anaknya, Lukman dan keluarga selepas pengsan di gerai kereta sorongnya. Isteri Luqman, Santi dan anak perempuan, Nada berasa kurang senang dengan kehadiran dan nasihat Mak Leha. Mereka akan menyeksa Mak Leha apabila Luqman tiada di rumah.(n)

programme.title: Dewi Rindu
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.(n)

programme.title: Pop Academy
programme.desc: Pop Academy adalah arena pencarian bakat muzik pop terbesar di Indonesia yang mencari bakat muda Indonesia yang mempunyai suara emas dalam menyanyikan genre muzik pop dan bersedia menjadi bintang. Dengan tagline "Be Pop Academy and Be A Super Stars\.(n)

programme.title: The Sultan
programme.desc: The Sultan adalah rancangan bual bicara yang menampilkan dua pengacara yang kaya bak Sultan, iaitu Sultan Andara-Raffi Ahmad dan Sultan Bintaro-Andre Taulany dan ditemani oleh pengawal yang cantik dan tampan. Rancangan ini turut menampilkan bintang-bintang tetamu Indonesia yang terkenal.(n)

programme.title: Juragan 11
programme.desc: Juragan 11 mempersembahkan hiburan dengan sajian komedi segar baharu, yang dimeriahkan oleh bintang tetamu terkenal Indonesia.(n)

programme.title: Mencintai Lewat Jalur Langit YGY
programme.desc: Kasihan Dita kerana daripada disuruh menjaga anak kecil, dia terpaksa menjaga Arya, teman lelaki kawan baiknya, di taman permainan. Akibatnya Arya yang playboy selalu menganggu Dita.(n)

programme.title: Rumahku Istanaku
programme.desc: Program realiti pertama di Indonesia yang berani menghadiahkan 1 unit rumah dan wang tunai untuk setiap episod.(n)

programme.title: Harta, Tahta, Cinta
programme.desc: Untuk memastikan rancangannya berjalan lancar, Chandra mendekati ramai janda kaya untuk menggunakan kekayaan mereka. Itulah yang dirasakan oleh Tiwi. Chandra sanggup menikahi Tiwi untuk kali kedua demi harta Tiwi. Chandra juga bekerjasama dengan kekasihnya untuk merampas kekayaan Tiwi.(n)

programme.title: Mencintai Lewat Jalur Langit YGY
programme.desc: Kasihan Dita kerana daripada disuruh menjaga anak kecil, dia terpaksa menjaga Arya, teman lelaki kawan baiknya, di taman permainan. Akibatnya Arya yang playboy selalu menganggu Dita.(n)

programme.title: Cinta Misteri
programme.desc: Seorang gadis bernama Kinanti yang baru berpindah ke Jakarta dan bersekolah di sekolah antarabangsa. Walaupun ada orang yang tidak menyukainya, dia berkawan dengan ramai pelajar. Kinanti juga berkawan dengan seorang gadis bernama Dinda. Rupanya, Dinda adalah hantu yang menetap di sekolah itu. Sejak itu, Kinanti dan rakannya sering berurusan dengan hantu. Sering kali mereka mengalami pengembaraan menarik yang berkaitan dengan dunia mistik.(n)

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.(n)

programme.title: Sejadah
programme.desc: Sejadah (Sehat Jadi Ibadah) adalah program yang akan memberikan maklumat mengenai kesihatan dari perspektif perubatan dan aspek lain. Dihoskan oleh pakar kesihatan Dr Cahyono, Sp.Naturophaty dan Ustadz Solmed.(n)

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.(n)

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.(n)

programme.title: Rasa Yang Terpaksa
programme.desc: Kisah cinta Acha dengan Irwansyah terpaksa ditamatkan kerana dia meninggalkannya tanpa sebab dan membuatkan dia terasa hati. Namun ternyata Acha meninggalkan Irwansyah atas sebab tertentu. Dia menjadi jaminan hutang ayahnya selepas ayahnya meninggal dunia dan terpaksa berkahwin dengan lelaki lain.(n)

programme.title: The Sultan S2
programme.desc: The Sultan adalah rancangan bual bicara yang menampilkan dua pengacara yang kaya bak Sultan, iaitu Sultan Andara-Raffi Ahmad dan Sultan Bintaro-Andre Taulany dan ditemani oleh pengawal yang cantik dan tampan. Rancangan ini turut menampilkan bintang-bintang tetamu Indonesia yang terkenal.(n)

programme.title: Barakallah
programme.desc: Barakallah merupakan program tausiah yang dibimbing oleh Abdel Achrian bersama Ustaz Solmed dan Ustaz Taufiqurrahman yang akan memfokuskan kepada membincangkan permasalahan yang sering dialami oleh masyarakat hingga kepada masalah kehidupan rumah tangga.(n)

programme.title: Sejuta Cinta untuk Kikan
programme.desc: Bagi Kikan, Danan merupakan rakan dan rakan sekerja di kafe itu. Kikan sukakan Danan begitu juga sebaliknya, tetapi Kikan terpaksa mengalah dengan Kinara, adiknya. Kinan mula mendekati Reza, salah seorang pengunjung yang sering mengunjungi kafe itu.(n)

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.(n)

programme.title: Semarak Indosiar 2020
programme.desc: Kemegahan panggung Indosiar dengan keindahan budaya Indonesia meskipun di tengah pandemik. Dianjurkan oleh hos terkenal Indonesia dan persembahan menakjubkan oleh pelbagai artis dan penyanyi.(n)

programme.title: Sejadah
programme.desc: Sejadah (Sehat Jadi Ibadah) adalah program yang akan memberikan maklumat mengenai kesihatan dari perspektif perubatan dan aspek lain. Dihoskan oleh pakar kesihatan Dr Cahyono, Sp.Naturophaty dan Ustadz Solmed.(n)

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.(n)

programme.title: Scoop
programme.desc: Seri dan Nasir adalah wartawan dan jurugambar yang gigih mencari scoop dalam liputan berita mereka. Selepas membuat scoop sindiket rokok di pulau pinang Nasir pulang ke Kuala Lumpur. Nasir terkejut apabila melihat isterinya sedang berasmara dengan lelaki lain di biliknya.(n)

programme.title: Eva
programme.desc: Seorang wanita yang dari kecil mengimpikan mempunyai kuasa ajaib seperti di miliki sahabatnya . Berhadapan dengan berbagai masalah akibat dirinya yang sering menyendiri dan cuba mencari identiti dirinya sendiri . Akhirnya beliau menyedari bahawa kelebihan yang diharapkannya sesuatu yang bakal memakan dirinya sendiri.(n)

programme.desc: Hazim trauma kerana tidak sempat bertemu ibunya. Dia menyalahkan dirinya kerana menghampakan Halimah. Ketika menghadap jenazah Halimah, tiba-tiba Hazim ditarik Khaidir ketika Hazim mahu mencium ibunya. Ketika itu Khaidir memberitahu yang Halimah bukan ibu kandungnya.(n)

programme.title: Tersuka Dia
programme.desc: seorang gadis jatuh hati kepada seorang pemuda tampan yang merupakan ketua pegawai eksekutif di syarikat miliknya . Gadis itu mula tertarik kepada pemuda ini setelah beliau bantu mengejar peragut beg tangannya . Pemuda itu turut jatuh hati terhadap si gadis yang pernah membulinya semasa di sekolah dahulu.(n)

programme.title: Salah Bapak
programme.desc: Amran seorang budak Delivery yang gemar berlumba secara haram motor Drag. Satu hari selepas memenagi satu perlumbaan, Amran telah di hadiahkan seorang perempuan bernama Maya sebagai habuan perlumbaan. Malang tidak berbau, mereka telah kemalangan dan Maya mati ditempat kejadian.(n)

programme.title: Taman Langsat Mayestik
programme.desc: Ozie, seorang pengarah filem, menjemput seorang penerbit untuk membuat filem seram. Ozie mengupah pasukan casting, tetapi dia tidak berpuas hati dengan hasilnya. Jadi dia mempunyai idea untuk memilih pelakon di lokasi paling berhantu di Jakarta.(n)

programme.title: Norlela
programme.desc: Mengisahkan kisah percintaan di timur tengah antara Norlela, dan Putera Amran. Norlela bekerja sebagai penghibur di istana. Raja, telah menitahkan agar Amran dikahwinkan dengan Puteri Faridah, dari kerajaan Zamin Tauran. Amran tidak bersetuju dan Raja telah murka dengan keputusan Amran.(n)

programme.title: Juvana
programme.desc: Daim iaitu bekas tahanan juvana Wira Bakti yang meneruskan persekolahannya di sebuah sekolah telah dibuli dan dimalukan oleh sekumpulan pelajar yang diketuai oleh Adam.Setelah Sekolah Wira Bakti diarahkan penutupannya 6 orang rakan-rakan Daim telah dipindahkan ke Sekolah Indera Sakti..(n)

programme.title: Sule Pulang Haji Dapet Jodoh
programme.desc: Tindakannya sebagai ustaz media sosial ini berjaya sehingga majikannya dan rakan-rakan pejabat yang mengikuti status paparannya percaya pada tahap ilmu keagamaannya . Hubungan cintanya dengan anak majikan juga mendapat sokongan . programme.title: Gerak Khas The Movie Iii
programme.desc: Unit Gerak Khas cuba menyelesaikan kes pembunuhan Suzana di sebuah pangsapuri mewah yang dipercayai mempunyai kaitan dengan Ramon (Faizal Hussein). Ramon merupakan adik kepada Frankie. penjenayah yang ditumpaskan oleh Unit Gerak Khas dalam satu operasi menentang kumpulan militan dan sindiket pengedaran dadah 2 tahun yang lalu.(n)

programme.title: Onrust
programme.desc: Dalam perjalanan ke Pulau Onrust, Bramanto Putra menjumpai sebuah diari purba semasa mencari objek bersejarah. Ia milik kekasih Maria Van De Velde, yang hilang secara misteri. Bram dan seorang lagi pelajar arkeologi bernama Susan memutuskan untuk melakukan penyelidikan tentang pemilik buku harian itu, yang membawa kepada akibat yang membawa maut kerana mereka secara tidak sengaja membuat sihir gelap ke atas pulau itu.(n)

programme.title: Setinggan
programme.desc: Penduduk di suatu setingan diganggu hantu. Mereka berkerja sama untuk mencari jalan penyelesaian. Akhirnya mereka berjaya menghalau hantu daripada menggangu setinggan mereka.(n)

programme.title: Senja Merah
programme.desc: Mahmud, seorang taikun yang berkahwin dengan seorang janda yang mempunyai seorang anak lelaki, Zubaidah adalah pengusaha restoran. Baharum, anak kepada zubaidah berkawan dengan Mahmud anak angkat Mira sejak kecil. Apabila dewasa, hubungan mereka semakin kuat dan mereka saling menyayangi. Maher, bimbang harta peninggalan bapanya akan jatuh ke tangan mereka berdua.(n)

programme.desc: Katy Perry is living proof that if you just be yourself, you can be anything! Get an inside look into the real Katy Perry and find out how this regular California girl with big dreams became one of the biggest stars in the world.(n)

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama

programme.title: Sensasi Bola
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.(n)

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.(n)

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Knockouts
programme.desc: Black History Month: Epic Knockouts - UFC Ultimate Knockouts brings you some of the most devastating finishes ever seen inside the Octagon.From one-punch knockouts to highlight reel kicks, you’ll seethe UFCs’s biggest names in their most memorable performances.(n)

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Dynamite
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a two-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.(n)

programme.title: Shark Grand Prix de France Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - Built in 1965 around the existing 24-Hour track, the Le Mans Bugatti Grand Prix race circuit lies 5km south of the city of Le Mans and 200km south-west of Paris. The venue has hosted Grand Prix since the late sixties but a serious accident to Spanish rider Alberto Puig in 1995 saw it struck off the calendar until 2000 whilst stringent safety improvements were carried out. Le Mans is a tight track dominated by first gear corners that place the emphasis on late braking and hard acceleration, whilst rear end traction is also a key area. With the capacity to comfortably accommodate up to 100,000 spectators, the Bugatti circuit also plays host to the 24 hour truck race, the FIA GP2 Championship, French Touring Car and GT races.(n)

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.(n)

programme.title: UFC 286: Edwards vs. Usman 3
programme.desc: Prelims - One of the welterweight division’s longest standing rivalries comes to a close in the main event of UFC 286 at the O2 Arena in London when England’s own Leon Edwards defends his crown against former champion Kamaru Usman in a rubber match the entire sports world will be watching. Fresh from a stunning knockout of Usman last August that evened their series at 1-1, Birmingham’s Edwards will now make his first title defense against “The Nigerian Nightmare,” who has won 19 of his last 20 bouts. Plus, two of the lightweight division’s most explosive contenders collide, as Justin Gaethje meets Rafael Fiziev in the UFC 286 co-main event.(n)

programme.title: UFC 286: Edwards vs. Usman 3
programme.desc: Main Event - One of the welterweight division’s longest standing rivalries comes to a close in the main event of UFC 286 at the O2 Arena in London when England’s own Leon Edwards defends his crown against former champion Kamaru Usman in a rubber match the entire sports world will be watching. Fresh from a stunning knockout of Usman last August that evened their series at 1-1, Birmingham’s Edwards will now make his first title defense against “The Nigerian Nightmare,” who has won 19 of his last 20 bouts. Plus, two of the lightweight division’s most explosive contenders collide, as Justin Gaethje meets Rafael Fiziev in the UFC 286 co-main event.(n)

programme.title: UFC The Walk
programme.desc: Ep.403: Usman vs Burns - In 2021, UFC Welterweight Champion Kamaru Usman took on former teammate and friend Gilbert Burns. Get an in-depth look at both athletes’ journeys to the Octagon and relive Usman’s performance as he cements his place in UFC history.(n)

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Yan vs. Dvalishvili
programme.desc: Prelims - A relentless force meets an immovable tank on March 11 when former bantamweight champion Petr “No Mercy” Yan faces Merab “The Machine” Dvalishvili in a highly anticipated UFC Fight Night main event at The Theater at Virgin Hotels in Las Vegas. On the road to regaining his 135-pound crown, Yan’s resume includes knockouts of Urijah Faber and Jose Aldo, and he plans on adding Dvalishvili’s name to that list, but with eight consecutive wins and an aggressive attack that has seen him defeat Aldo, Marlon Moraes and Cody Stamann, “The Machine” is no one’s stepping stone.(n)

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Yan vs. Dvalishvili
programme.desc: Main Event - A relentless force meets an immovable tank on March 11 when former bantamweight champion Petr “No Mercy” Yan faces Merab “The Machine” Dvalishvili in a highly anticipated UFC Fight Night main event at The Theater at Virgin Hotels in Las Vegas. On the road to regaining his 135-pound crown, Yan’s resume includes knockouts of Urijah Faber and Jose Aldo, and he plans on adding Dvalishvili’s name to that list, but with eight consecutive wins and an aggressive attack that has seen him defeat Aldo, Marlon Moraes and Cody Stamann, “The Machine” is no one’s stepping stone.(n)

programme.title: UFC Reloaded

programme.title: UFC Main Event
programme.desc: Ep.904: Namajunas vs. Zhang 2 - New York’s Madison Square Garden hosted a rematch between “Thug” Rose Namajunas and Zhang Weili at UFC 268. See both women train and prepare for battle once again to decide the queen of the strawweight division.(n)

programme.desc: Ep.UFC 272 : Covington vs Masvidal - Former friends and teammates turned bitter rivals, Colby “Chaos” Covington and Jorge “Gamebred” Masvidal headlined an action-packed card for UFC 272. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.(n)

programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night: Vera vs. Sandhagen
programme.desc: Prelims - In the UFC’s toughest division, every fight is a must win, and Top 5 bantamweight contenders Marlon Vera and Cory Sandhagen know that to get into the title conversation, a win in their UFC Fight Night main event at the AT&T Center in San Antonio on March 25 is essential to their championship hopes. Riding a four-fight winning streak that includes knockouts of UFC legends Frankie Edgar and Dominick Cruz, Vera is on the fast track to the top, but to get there, he must defeat Colorado’s Sandhagen, a versatile battler coming off a stoppage of Song Yadong to end 2022.(n)

Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.(n)

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Knockouts
programme.desc: Black History Month “Incredible Knockouts” - UFC Ultimate Knockouts brings you some of the most devastating finishes ever seen inside the Octagon. From one-punch knockouts to highlight reel kicks, you’ll see the UFC’s biggest names in their most memorable performance.(n)

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Dynamite
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a two-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.(n)

programme.title: Shark Grand Prix de France Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - Built in 1965 around the existing 24-Hour track, the Le Mans Bugatti Grand Prix race circuit lies 5km south of the city of Le Mans and 200km south-west of Paris. The venue has hosted Grand Prix since the late sixties but a serious accident to Spanish rider Alberto Puig in 1995 saw it struck off the calendar until 2000 whilst stringent safety improvements were carried out. Le Mans is a tight track dominated by first gear corners that place the emphasis on late braking and hard acceleration, whilst rear end traction is also a key area. With the capacity to comfortably accommodate up to 100,000 spectators, the Bugatti circuit also plays host to the 24 hour truck race, the FIA GP2 Championship, French Touring Car and GT races.(n)

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.(n)

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Vera vs. Sandhagen
programme.desc: Prelims - In the UFC’s toughest division, every fight is a must win, and Top 5 bantamweight contenders Marlon Vera and Cory Sandhagen know that to get into the title conversation, a win in their UFC Fight Night main event at the AT&T Center in San Antonio on March 25 is essential to their championship hopes. Riding a four-fight winning streak that includes knockouts of UFC legends Frankie Edgar and Dominick Cruz, Vera is on the fast track to the top, but to get there, he must defeat Colorado’s Sandhagen, a versatile battler coming off a stoppage of Song Yadong to end 2022.(n)

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Vera vs. Sandhagen
programme.desc: Main Event - In the UFC’s toughest division, every fight is a must win, and Top 5 bantamweight contenders Marlon Vera and Cory Sandhagen know that to get into the title conversation, a win in their UFC Fight Night main event at the AT&T Center in San Antonio on March 25 is essential to their championship hopes. programme.title: UFC 286: Edwards vs. Usman 3
programme.desc: Prelims - One of the welterweight division’s longest standing rivalries comes to a close in the main event of UFC 286 at the O2 Arena in London when England’s own Leon Edwards defends his crown against former champion Kamaru Usman in a rubber match the entire sports world will be watching. Fresh from a stunning knockout of Usman last August that evened their series at 1-1, Birmingham’s Edwards will now make his first title defense against “The Nigerian Nightmare,” who has won 19 of his last 20 bouts. Plus, two of the lightweight division’s most explosive contenders collide, as Justin Gaethje meets Rafael Fiziev in the UFC 286 co-main event.(n)

programme.title: UFC 286: Edwards vs. Usman 3
programme.desc: Main Event - One of the welterweight division’s longest standing rivalries comes to a close in the main event of UFC 286 at the O2 Arena in London when England’s own Leon Edwards defends his crown against former champion Kamaru Usman in a rubber match the entire sports world will be watching. Fresh from a stunning knockout of Usman last August that evened their series at 1-1, Birmingham’s Edwards will now make his first title defense against “The Nigerian Nightmare,” who has won 19 of his last 20 bouts. Plus, two of the lightweight division’s most explosive contenders collide, as Justin Gaethje meets Rafael Fiziev in the UFC 286 co-main event.(n)

programme.title: UFC The Walk
programme.desc: Ep.403: Usman vs Burns - In 2021, UFC Welterweight Champion Kamaru Usman took on former teammate and friend Gilbert Burns. Get an in-depth look at both athletes’ journeys to the Octagon and relive Usman’s performance as he cements his place in UFC history.(n)

programme.title: UFC The Walk

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Strength in Sisterhood
programme.desc: The Hollywood pride reels after the Nomad’s brutal attack on their leader, Ava, leaves her desperately weak and unable to hunt. To add to her woes, her hungry pride start rejecting her. But without her, they struggle to bring down prey.(n)

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - Horses of the Sun
programme.desc: Grévy’s zebras population has dropped by 50% in less than 20 years. Environmentalists say that if we aren’t vigilant, they could disappear all together. Lewa Conservancy is at the heart of efforts to protect the species so that they can replenish their numbers.(n)

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - Vanishing Wilderness
programme.desc: Kenya's growing human population is taking land and resources away from wildlife. The squeeze is creating increasing numbers of conflicts between humans and animals, and is one of the biggest issues in African conservation.(n)

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - India & Sri Lanka's Deadly Mother's Day
programme.desc: Find out which creatures survive and whose luck will run out as animal mothers and moms-to-be struggle with sweltering temperatures, lurking predators, mating season, and drought on a day that proves to be no holiday.(n)

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Strength in Sisterhood
programme.desc: The Hollywood pride reels after the Nomad’s brutal attack on their leader, Ava, leaves her desperately weak and unable to hunt. To add to her woes, her hungry pride start rejecting her. But without her, they struggle to bring down prey.(n)

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Brought Back from the Brink
programme.desc: Face a life-and-death struggle with vet Bec, who gives a koala joey mouth-to-mouth, and see vet Meaghan test her microsurgical skills on a baby fruit bat’s teeny toes. Catch a bath-averse python and tag along as rescuer Jo nabs a trapped barn owl.(n)

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - A Koala Called Cavendish
programme.desc: Watch senior vet Tim tutor new recruit Phil through an injured koala checkup, and track the team’s solutions for animals plagued by the summer heat. Celebrate as vet Karina solves a puzzling frog case and releases an old friend who’s ready to fly.(n)

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Head & Neck
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered why mandrills have such colorful faces, why vultures are bald, or even why hammerheads have, well, hammer-shaped heads? Discover how animals managed to survive by evolving from the neck up.(n)

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 - Precious Waters
programme.desc: Life in the savannas of Africa is ruled by water. And throughout the long dry season, life-giving rivers run dry and harsh drought conditions prevail, making waterholes crowded.(n)

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 - Sanctuary
programme.desc: There’s strength in numbers. Especially in the wild. For many species, it’s the very reason why individuals come together. Protecting the empire is imperative to survival. For these animals, protection means isolation – finding sanctuary from the threats outside their boundaries.(n)

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - Horses of the Sun
programme.desc: Grévy’s zebras population has dropped by 50% in less than 20 years. Environmentalists say that if we aren’t vigilant, they could disappear all together. Lewa Conservancy is at the heart of efforts to protect the species so that they can replenish their numbers.(n)

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 - Precious Waters
programme.desc: Life in the savannas of Africa is ruled by water. And throughout the long dry season, life-giving rivers run dry and harsh drought conditions prevail, making waterholes crowded.(n)

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Human Influenced
programme.desc: In geological and biological scales, humans have only been around for the blink of an eye, and yet we’ve managed to influence the evolutionary path for many animals. Explore the human impact on dogs, wolves, coyotes, elephants, and more.(n)

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - Horses of the Sun
programme.desc: Grévy’s zebras population has dropped by 50% in less than 20 years. Environmentalists say that if we aren’t vigilant, they could disappear all together. Lewa Conservancy is at the heart of efforts to protect the species so that they can replenish their numbers.(n)

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - Vanishing Wilderness
programme.desc: Kenya's growing human population is taking land and resources away from wildlife. The squeeze is creating increasing numbers of conflicts between humans and animals, and is one of the biggest issues in African conservation.(n)

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - India & Sri Lanka's Deadly Mother's Day
programme.desc: Find out which creatures survive and whose luck will run out as animal mothers and moms-to-be struggle with sweltering temperatures, lurking predators, mating season, and drought on a day that proves to be no holiday.(n)

programme.desc: The Hollywood pride reels after the Nomad’s brutal attack on their leader, Ava, leaves her desperately weak and unable to hunt. To add to her woes, her hungry pride start rejecting her. But without her, they struggle to bring down prey.(n)

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Brought Back from the Brink
programme.desc: Face a life-and-death struggle with vet Bec, who gives a koala joey mouth-to-mouth, and see vet Meaghan test her microsurgical skills on a baby fruit bat’s teeny toes. Catch a bath-averse python and tag along as rescuer Jo nabs a trapped barn owl.(n)

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - A Koala Called Cavendish
programme.desc: Watch senior vet Tim tutor new recruit Phil through an injured koala checkup, and track the team’s solutions for animals plagued by the summer heat. Celebrate as vet Karina solves a puzzling frog case and releases an old friend who’s ready to fly.(n)

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Interior
programme.desc: Some of the most interesting adaptations in the animal world are completely invisible. Study these hidden, internal alterations to see how different animals have evolved to survive in amazing and unseen ways.(n)

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Eyes
programme.desc: Why do zebras have stripes? How do penguins see underwater? And why are a tree frog’s eyes red? In this exploration of sight, discover how some animals have evolved to see extremely well while others have evolved to be nearly invisible.(n)

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 - And So it Begins…
programme.desc: Head to the heart of Central Kalimantan, Borneo - home to one of the most unique schools in the world. There are 68 students in all, including class clown Valentino (who loves a short-cut) and class couple Darril and Liti (who have their first fight).(n)

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 - Movin’ on Up
programme.desc: Best buds Valentino, Madara and Utris are ready for the next stage of forest school. Baby Clarita is at long last reunited with her mother. And toddler Mema discovers a tasty treat inside a rotten log (it can happen!).(n)

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 - King Kasper
programme.desc: Even orangutans have to watch what they eat. Find out if Beni can stick to a leafy green diet (and stop stealing food). See what kind of tasty treats Lanting can find while skipping class. And watch as Rebecca prepares to return to a truly wild life.(n)

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 - The Misfits
programme.desc: There’s watery fun with group two as they visit group three’s flooded classroom. Ayu, Ruthie, and Kesi take a step closer to release. And the arrival of Alba - the world’s rarest orangutan - creates a sensation at Orangutan Jungle School.(n)

programme.title: The Great Elephant Tale
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of three elephants across three very distinct African habitats. Their travels combine to tell the story of how these emotional and intelligent creatures evolved over millions of years to survive on the continent.(n)

programme.title: Osprey: Sea Raptor
programme.desc: A veteran pair of osprey return home to a Connecticut saltmarsh. Over one summer they must battle their enemies, withstand the elements, and hunt hundreds and hundreds of fish, all to raise the next generation of sea raptors.(n)

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 - Frida the Jaguar Cub
programme.desc: Test limits with jaguar cub Frida, who’s honing her survival skills in Brazil’s Caiman Lodge Reserve. Learn how to sneak with mum Gatuna, see sister Anouk help her hide from hungry interlopers, and go on a reckless solo trek that takes a lucky turn.(n)

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 - Lola the Sea Lion Pup
programme.desc: Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentina’s coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Maria’s side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.(n)

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Pacific Islands: Commotion in the Ocean
programme.desc: Live through a sunny tropical September day with creatures from Polynesia to the Indonesian archipelago. See how the sun affects the movement, feeding habits, and mating rituals of everything from tiny zooplankton to whale sharks.(n)

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Australian Spring Fever
programme.desc: Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.(n)

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Interior
programme.desc: Some of the most interesting adaptations in the animal world are completely invisible. Study these hidden, internal alterations to see how different animals have evolved to survive in amazing and unseen ways.(n)

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Pacific Islands: Commotion in the Ocean
programme.desc: Live through a sunny tropical September day with creatures from Polynesia to the Indonesian archipelago. See how the sun affects the movement, feeding habits, and mating rituals of everything from tiny zooplankton to whale sharks.(n)

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Australian Spring Fever
programme.desc: Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.(n)

programme.title: Monkey Island 1 - Leaving Home
programme.desc: An ancient citadel once home to Sri Lanka’s kings has now been reclaimed by the jungle… and there’s a new dynasty in power. Monkeys.(n)

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Eyes
programme.desc: Why do zebras have stripes? How do penguins see underwater? And why are a tree frog’s eyes red? In this exploration of sight, discover how some animals have evolved to see extremely well while others have evolved to be nearly invisible.(n)

programme.title: The Great Elephant Tale
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of three elephants across three very distinct African habitats. Their travels combine to tell the story of how these emotional and intelligent creatures evolved over millions of years to survive on the continent.(n)

programme.title: Osprey: Sea Raptor
programme.desc: A veteran pair of osprey return home to a Connecticut saltmarsh. Over one summer they must battle their enemies, withstand the elements, and hunt hundreds and hundreds of fish, all to raise the next generation of sea raptors.(n)

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 - Frida the Jaguar Cub
programme.desc: Test limits with jaguar cub Frida, who’s honing her survival skills in Brazil’s Caiman Lodge Reserve. Learn how to sneak with mum Gatuna, see sister Anouk help her hide from hungry interlopers, and go on a reckless solo trek that takes a lucky turn.(n)

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 - Lola the Sea Lion Pup
programme.desc: Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentina’s coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Maria’s side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.(n)

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Pacific Islands: Commotion in the Ocean
programme.desc: Live through a sunny tropical September day with creatures from Polynesia to the Indonesian archipelago. See how the sun affects the movement, feeding habits, and mating rituals of everything from tiny zooplankton to whale sharks.(n)

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Australian Spring Fever
programme.desc: Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.(n)

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Social Animals
programme.desc: Cooperation comes in many forms. Some animals cooperate to be social while others put the welfare of the group above their own reproductive potential. See the many ways species have evolved to work with one another in order to survive.(n)

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Ancient Lineages
programme.desc: Some call them “living fossils”, but that's just another way to say survivors. From the shark to the horseshoe crab, these animals' early adaptations were a success, leaving them relatively unchanged for millions of years.(n)

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 - A Whole New World
programme.desc: Now that albino orangutan Alba’s here, how will her classmates react? Plus, take a tour of the nursery school, see how Beni deals with a big bully, and watch as a few feisty females find their place in a new hierarchy.(n)

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 - Weighs and Means
programme.desc: Beni faces his weigh-in while Alba is back in isolation. Pujon reclaims his position as gang leader. A team heads out to rescue an infant orangutan. And an unwelcome visitor prompts the staff to introduce a cautionary lesson in snake awareness.(n)

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 - Handle with Care
programme.desc: Rescued orphan Josh needs his broken wrist examined, and Beni visits the dentist to treat his bad breath. Having overcome her typhoid infection, Alba is reunited with her old friends, but receives a frosty reception.(n)

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 - Teens, Tots and Tantrums
programme.desc: It’s a first at forest school. Inside the clinic, the team meets a mysterious new creature. It turns out to be a sun bear - the tiniest of all bears! Find out how Denny Bear fares in these new surroundings.(n)

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.(n)

programme.title: How the Wild Things Sleep
programme.desc: There is an endless variety of sleep-strategies among animals, yet it seems a universal behavior. But why bother with sleep at all? How do animals cope without sleep or the dangers of being unconscious in the wild? Just some of the baffling questions that lead through How the Wild Things Sleep.(n)

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Punks on the Run
programme.desc: The lions of the Nomad pride rampage deep into the heart of the MK pride’s territory, scattering its members and coming dangerously close to the five new MK cubs. Meanwhile, the Hollywoods are recovering, and Ava’s survival skills are still intact.(n)

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Punks Strike Back
programme.desc: After the dry season lowers the waters, siblings Kimba and Maya risk crossing the river to search for their parents. They run the gauntlet of the densest populations of crocs and hippos in Africa, and face an even greater threat on the other side.(n)

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Hollywoods Held Hostage
programme.desc: During the last few weeks of the dry season, the prides stick close to the only available water in the river. But in Luangwa, that proximity spells danger - especially when the scent of a hippo kill compels the Hollywoods to cross the river.(n)

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Next Dynasty
programme.desc: The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.(n)

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Social Animals
programme.desc: Cooperation comes in many forms. Some animals cooperate to be social while others put the welfare of the group above their own reproductive potential. See the many ways species have evolved to work with one another in order to survive.(n)

programme.title: Monkey Island 1 - Trouble in Paradise
programme.desc: Relaxing among the ancient temples of Sri Lanka, tufted grey langurs share their territory with a troop of toque macaques and a group of purple face leaf monkeys. This is primate paradise. But a crippling drought changes everything. The three species are forced to adapt and take risks.(n)

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Ancient Lineages
programme.desc: Some call them “living fossils”, but that's just another way to say survivors. From the shark to the horseshoe crab, these animals' early adaptations were a success, leaving them relatively unchanged for millions of years.(n)

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Next Dynasty
programme.desc: The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.(n)

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Isle Royale
programme.desc: Since the 1900s, this uninhabited island in Lake Superior has been a constant battleground between moose and wolves. Scientists have been watching closely since 1953, making it one of the oldest research projects in the country. We go with lead researcher Rolf Peterson as he gets a band of volunteers to scour the island for moose bones, trying to piece together population numbers after a long winter.(n)

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Invaders from the Deep
programme.desc: As far as invasive species go, Asian carp are some of the nastiest invaders around. They've thus far made their way up America's waterways, snaking up the Illinois river, eating voraciously, breeding quickly, and decimating native fish populations and their food supplies.(n)

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 - The Blue Lagoon
programme.desc: Nestled on the western coast of South Africa lies an extraordinary cove that is host to an abundance of marine and bird life. It provides ample food and spurs a life cycle that reaches well beyond Africa. This is the Blue Lagoon.(n)

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 - Migration
programme.desc: Epic flights, adventurous sea journeys and exhausting road trips all play a key part in the lives of many species. These empires travel in search of food, shelter or a mate. But booking and organizing travel is no easy feat when those plans involve hundreds – even thousands – of individuals.(n)

programme.title: Osprey: Sea Raptor
programme.desc: A veteran pair of osprey return home to a Connecticut saltmarsh. Over one summer they must battle their enemies, withstand the elements, and hunt hundreds and hundreds of fish, all to raise the next generation of sea raptors.(n)

programme.title: How the Wild Things Sleep
programme.desc: There is an endless variety of sleep-strategies among animals, yet it seems a universal behavior. But why bother with sleep at all? How do animals cope without sleep or the dangers of being unconscious in the wild? Just some of the baffling questions that lead through How the Wild Things Sleep.(n)

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Spiky and Stinky
programme.desc: Check out vet Phil’s clever tactics for handling prickly patients and marvel as RSPCA rescuer Chantel extracts a sooty possum duo from a chimney. Cheer on the clinic’s favorite survivor and see vet Meaghan unhook a curlew who’s the catch of the day.(n)

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Spoonbill Soft Shoe Shuffle
programme.desc: Join the team’s scramble to help a trio of distressed baby wallabies and a koala joey who’s having seizures. Scale a tree with rescuer Jo to net a wounded lizard, see kookaburra feather-implant surgery, and admire a spoonbill’s new corrective shoes.(n)

programme.title: Osprey: Sea Raptor
programme.desc: A veteran pair of osprey return home to a Connecticut saltmarsh. Over one summer they must battle their enemies, withstand the elements, and hunt hundreds and hundreds of fish, all to raise the next generation of sea raptors.(n)

How do animals cope without sleep or the dangers of being unconscious in the wild? Just some of the baffling questions that lead through How the Wild Things Sleep.(n)

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Leaping Into Life
programme.desc: It’s spring, and the farm is bursting with new life. Watch a ewe give birth to twins, an orphaned Hereford calf struggle to find a surrogate mother, and the top hen nestle down in her maternity coop.(n)

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Great Escape
programme.desc: Experience life on the farm as things heat up for summer. Watch animals swelter in a rare heatwave, try to stay cool in the nearby freshwater stream, and stash supplies for fall.(n)

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Leaping Into Life

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Great Escape
programme.desc: Experience life on the farm as things heat up for summer. Watch animals swelter in a rare heatwave, try to stay cool in the nearby freshwater stream, and stash supplies for fall.(n)

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - The Goby Effect
programme.desc: The Lake Erie Watersnake is currently on the brink of extinction, and researchers have been fighting to get it back. And it looks like it's finally working - thanks to the round goby. Grad student Lizzy Mack is heading out on day trips to catch bucket loads of the snakes, collect measurements, and inject them with small microchips to track them along their way, all while dodging bites from some of the crankiest snakes around.(n)

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Bad Reputations
programme.desc: Where animals and humans co-exist, how do you stop a bad reputation from pushing a species towards extinction? From rattlesnakes to cormorants, see how creatures that have bad reputations are being dealt with when it comes to conservation.(n)

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 - The Chobe River
programme.desc: Deep in southern Africa, a mighty river snakes through untamed wilderness. Its vast flood plains are a magnet for wildlife. In the dry season animals travel great distances to reach this oasis and during droughts space and resources are at a premium. But every animal has its place along the banks of the mighty Chobe river...(n)

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 - Lady Elliot Island
programme.desc: Lady Elliot Island is the crown jewel of the Great Barrier Reef- the largest living structure on Earth. This southern-most island of the Reef chain is home to dizzying swirls of colour, life and diversity both above and below the water.(n)

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 - Frida the Jaguar Cub
programme.desc: Test limits with jaguar cub Frida, who’s honing her survival skills in Brazil’s Caiman Lodge Reserve. Learn how to sneak with mum Gatuna, see sister Anouk help her hide from hungry interlopers, and go on a reckless solo trek that takes a lucky turn.(n)

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - A Capuchin’s Tale
programme.desc: Growing up in the rainforests in the heart of Colombia, a young capuchin monkey has to master his climbing skills, learn how to find food and learn to distinguish friend from foe.(n)

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - The Hummingbird’s Quest
programme.desc: From Colombia’s high plains of the Páramo to its tropical forests, hummingbirds have evolved into an extraordinary number of species. Whether battling freezing rain or jungle predators, each mother must struggle to build a nest, protect her eggs.(n)

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Endangered Species
programme.desc: With seven of Ontario’s eight turtle species listed as endangered, the push is on to keep population numbers up. But turtles are slow, which means they keep taking a beating from both predators and cars. Can they be saved?(n)

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - The Damning Truth
programme.desc: A dam is an engineering feat, controlling massive amounts of water. But it can also wreak havoc on the animals that call those waters home.(n)

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 - Source to Sea
programme.desc: All rivers are on a quest, a constant mission to find the ocean, an endless cycle to move water across the vast blue planet. Along the way they support countless lives but their odyssey is by no means easy. From ice to heat, obstacles abound. Yet, despite an ever-changing nature, a river always finds its way - on the journey from Source to Sea.(n)

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 - Kangaroo Island
programme.desc: Kangaroo Island, off the southern coast of Australia, is an ocean fortress cut off by wild seas and battered by brutal Southern Ocean winds. It’s an enchanted refuge where some of the most iconic mainland fauna have made a last stand.(n)

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 - Lola the Sea Lion Pup
programme.desc: Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentina’s coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Maria’s side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.(n)

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Punks Strike Back
programme.desc: After the dry season lowers the waters, siblings Kimba and Maya risk crossing the river to search for their parents. They run the gauntlet of the densest populations of crocs and hippos in Africa, and face an even greater threat on the other side.(n)

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - A Capuchin’s Tale
programme.desc: Growing up in the rainforests in the heart of Colombia, a young capuchin monkey has to master his climbing skills, learn how to find food and learn to distinguish friend from foe.(n)

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - The Hummingbird’s Quest
programme.desc: From Colombia’s high plains of the Páramo to its tropical forests, hummingbirds have evolved into an extraordinary number of species. Whether battling freezing rain or jungle predators, each mother must struggle to build a nest, protect her eggs.(n)

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 - Lola the Sea Lion Pup
programme.desc: Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentina’s coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Maria’s side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.(n)

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Punks Strike Back
programme.desc: After the dry season lowers the waters, siblings Kimba and Maya risk crossing the river to search for their parents. They run the gauntlet of the densest populations of crocs and hippos in Africa, and face an even greater threat on the other side.(n)

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 2 - Indonesia - Life in the Muck
programme.desc: The waters surrounding Indonesia’s sprawling archipelago are home to the world’s richest reefs and the highest marine biodiversity on earth. Within this undersea Amazon, a hidden ecosystem goes unnoticed. Buried beneath a seabed littered with trash, a community of strange and fascinating creatures thrives against all odds. It is a place where predators and prey run an evolutionary arms race and develop ever-more unlikely ways of attack and defense. On this mucky seabed, nothing is as it seems. It is a place where fish can walk and even change colors.(n)

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 2 - Maldives - Paradise Shrinking
programme.desc: The Maldives, a low-lying archipelago in the Indian Ocean, faces an uncertain future. Rising sea levels threaten to wipe out this tiny island nation. As the water rises, researchers are using nature to help keep the Maldives from disappearing. They are rebuilding the reef that protects the islands and may keep the Maldives from disappearing into the ocean.(n)

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Endangered Species
programme.desc: With seven of Ontario’s eight turtle species listed as endangered, the push is on to keep population numbers up. But turtles are slow, which means they keep taking a beating from both predators and cars. Can they be saved?(n)

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 - Source to Sea
programme.desc: All rivers are on a quest, a constant mission to find the ocean, an endless cycle to move water across the vast blue planet. Along the way they support countless lives but their odyssey is by no means easy. From ice to heat, obstacles abound. Yet, despite an ever-changing nature, a river always finds its way - on the journey from Source to Sea.(n)

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - The Damning Truth
programme.desc: A dam is an engineering feat, controlling massive amounts of water. But it can also wreak havoc on the animals that call those waters home.(n)

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Creatures of the Night
programme.desc: Flying squirrels leaping through the air is quite a sight - especially for researchers who know they’re not supposed to be here. The Southern flying squirrel, typically found along the shores of Lake Erie, is now moving its territory up towards Lake Ontario and beyond thanks to warmer winters.(n)

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Back from the Dead
programme.desc: Sometimes animals get a second chance. Like the majestic elk, which went extinct in Ontario thanks to habitat loss and over-aggressive hunting. But a few years ago, hundreds of elk were brought back, to re-populate the province in four different areas. Some floundered because of new, aggressive local predators. But a colony of elk in Burwash, on a former prison ground, is thriving.(n)

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 - Wetland Wonder
programme.desc: Southern Africa is gripped in a punishing drought. Across the region plants and animals are suffering. At times like this water becomes critical survival and wetlands become magnets for life. This film is a celebration of South Africa’s greatest wetland – Lake St Lucia.(n)

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 - Christmas Island
programme.desc: Christmas Island, over a thousand kilometres northwest of Australia’s mainland, is a speck of an island that rises out of the Indian Ocean, a tiny refuge to plants and creatures found nowhere else in the world. Birds rule its skies and it’s stunning landscapes are the stage for a miracle migration of millions.(n)

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Pacific Islands: Commotion in the Ocean
programme.desc: Live through a sunny tropical September day with creatures from Polynesia to the Indonesian archipelago. See how the sun affects the movement, feeding habits, and mating rituals of everything from tiny zooplankton to whale sharks.(n)

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Hollywoods Held Hostage
programme.desc: During the last few weeks of the dry season, the prides stick close to the only available water in the river. But in Luangwa, that proximity spells danger - especially when the scent of a hippo kill compels the Hollywoods to cross the river.(n)

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 2 - Indonesia - Life in the Muck

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - A Place in the Wild
programme.desc: Kenya takes a major step with the opening of its first community-run rhino sanctuary in the heart of Samburu territory. The threat to Kenya’s rhinos from armed, illegal poaching gangs is the highest it's been in 40 years, which makes the sanctuary vital.(n)

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - Masked Bandits
programme.desc: Capture teams from Kenya head to Somali border to capture 50 rare and endangered antelope called a hirola. The hirola numbers have been plummeting over the last decade, and conservation groups know that by capturing and placing them into a protected predator-free conservancy they will rebound.(n)

programme.title: Baby Animals 1 - Mini Giants
programme.desc: Elephants, gorillas, rhinos, and bison are among the largest and most imposing land-dwelling mammals, but they all start out as helpless infants. See how babies from each species find their way to becoming giants.(n)

programme.title: Baby Animals 1 - Mother's Darlings
programme.desc: Not all infants in the animal kingdom get to have a good mother. But these are the stories of the lucky ones, from a ring-tailed lemur who learns everything from its mom to a tiny orangutan that receives a constant supply of motherly cuddles.(n)

programme.title: Monkey Island 1 - A Mother's Tale
programme.desc: The jungle of Sri Lanka is a monkey’s paradise. But not everyone here is equal. Anna sits at the bottom of the social ladder. And with a newborn baby, life is getting tougher. As drought grips the region tensions boil over. Anna is a devoted mother. But can she do enough to keep her son alive?(n)

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 - Fraser Island
programme.desc: Just to the south of the Great Barrier Reef and the Tropic of Capricorn, Fraser Island lies like a sprawling lizard. Some 120 kilometers long and up to 25 kilometers wide, Fraser Island is now the largest sand island on Earth. Somehow on this nutrient-poor bed of sand life has thrived. Dingoes patrol its forests in search of wallabies while white-bellied sea eagles scour the beaches from above. From the lakes to the forests and its crystal clear streams - Fraser Island is a unique mosaic of unlikely habitats that have earned it World Heritage Status.(n)
